CourseOffering.name: CourseOffering
CourseOffering.description: Represents an instance of a training course with location and date details of training courses.

AcademicSessionId.description: The Academic Session associated with the Course Offering.

EnrolleeCount.description: The current number of enrollees in the Course Offering.

EnrollmentCapacity.description: The maximum number of students that are allowed to enroll for the Course Offering.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the Course Offering is active (true) or not (false).

LearningCourseId.description: The Learning Course record associated with the Course Offering.

PrimaryFacultyId.description: The Contact associated with the Course Offering as lead instructor.

SectionNumber.description: Differentiates a Course Offering from other sections in an academic term.

WaitlistCapacity.description: The maximum number of students that can be waitlisted for the Course Offering.

WaitlistCount.description: The current number of people on the waitlist for the Course Offering.
